channel.title: Need cache help!
channel.description:
I zipped my cache folder and changed the cache download link at CacheDownloader.java but it's giving me error..
http://screencast.com/t/lhkhCH8CGvT
http://screencast.com/t/fxBuUYJuex

item.title: Need cache help!
item.dc:creator: @Cuber317 Cuber317
item.description:
@Cuber317 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:541557”]All the files in that screenie were auto generated. The main_files were made by signlink and the cacheVersion by whatever cache downloader you use.
I downloaded your cache (to see if you were doing anything incorrectly) and you seem to have packed the cache into the zip incorrectly.
This link should work for you. Please consider uploading the zip to your dropbox, as I will not keep it on mine forever.

When zipping files for the cache, make sure to zip all the cache files and not the folder they are all in, use mine as a reference. If this sounds confusing tell me and I’ll try to explain it better.[/quote]

I got it, thanks.
Always thought you need to upload the folder, sorry. :palm:

Read full topic

item.title: Need cache help!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

All the files in that screenie were auto generated. The main_files were made by signlink and the cacheVersion by whatever cache downloader you use.
I downloaded your cache (to see if you were doing anything incorrectly) and you seem to have packed the cache into the zip incorrectly.
This link should work for you. Please consider uploading the zip to your dropbox, as I will not keep it on mine forever.

When zipping files for the cache, make sure to zip all the cache files and not the folder they are all in, use mine as a reference. If this sounds confusing tell me and I’ll try to explain it better.

Read full topic

item.title: Need cache help!
item.dc:creator: @Cuber317 Cuber317
item.description:
@Cuber317 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:541557”]403 means forbidden (for that http error). So ohokay is right, you have a bad link.
Are you making sure to copy the direct link? It should have .zip at the end if anything.[/quote]

Link: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/c4hmq3qs42wcql6/ExilCacheV10.zip

It starts downloading the cache but stops at:
http://screencast.com/t/c6EPw0Br

Read full topic

item.title: Need cache help!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

403 means forbidden (for that http error). So ohokay is right, you have a bad link.
Are you making sure to copy the direct link? It should have .zip at the end if anything.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Cuber317 Cuber317
item.description:
@Cuber317 wrote:

it is right link…wanna connect to me? :palm:

item.title: Need cache help!
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:

Bad link.

Make sure you’re copying the address correctly.
